title: New: Bliss Club – Isabeau
body:
With thanks to our good friends over at Music Broke My Bones for this tip, Vancouver based outfit **Bliss Club** have followed up their much hyped ‘Breeze Punk 2’ with the dreamier, more serene ‘Isabeau’.

A greater clarity of vocals allows ‘Isabeau’ to be more directly engaging than their previous effort, however the track enterprises upon the same electronic melancholia which provided such a firm, and interesting, base for Bliss Club’s sound.
